title: Arrows Thick in the Air (4U110)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Archery or Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Men to wound each roaming minion.
Lore:	“He came to rest in the fern a few feet away, face downward, green arrow-feathers sticking from his neck below a golden collar.”
Rarity:	U
